overview: Mahrous, a simple man, is acquainted with the minister as they both hail from the same village. When Mahrous gets appointed at the minister's office, he only causes trouble. However, as the two get involved in extra-marital relationships, they form a strange bond and become square in many endeavors.
tagline: El Wad Mahrous Betaa Al Wazir
title: Mahrous the Minister's Attaché
